content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Duisburg, let's focus solely on discussing the rental price for this conversation. To begin negotiations, I propose a price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal. I need to carefully consider this offer since my goal is to secure the lowest possible rental price. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this moment until I assess this figure further.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
